channel.title: R on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Analysis for Green Card processing time
item.description: This short project investigates whether the Trump administration has slowed down the labor certification & green card application process for foreign workers. The analysis relies on DOL/OFLC and USCIS open data. Results Short Article Code on Github

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
